name: scRNAbox
author: MNI BIOINFO CORE
description: scRNAbox is a collection of tools for single-cell RNA-seq data analysis.

inputs.name: Working directory
inputs.description: Working directory (where all the outputs will be printed) it will created if it does not exist in you current directory

inputs.name: Steps
inputs.description: Specify what steps, e.g., 2 to run step 2. 2-6, run steps 2 through 6

inputs.name: Method
inputs.description: Select your preferred method: HTO and SCRNA for hashtag, and Standard scRNA, respectively.

inputs.name: MSD
inputs.description: You can get the hashtag labels by running the following code (HTO Step 4).

inputs.name: Marker GSEA
inputs.description: Identify marker genes for each cluster and run marker gene set enrichment analysis (GSEA) using EnrichR libraries (Step 7).

inputs.name: Known markers
inputs.description: Profile the individual or aggregated expression of known marker genes.

inputs.name: Reference annotation
inputs.description: Generate annotation predictions based on the annotations of a reference Seurat object (Step 7).

inputs.name: Clustering annotatations
inputs.description: Add clustering annotations to Seurat object metadata (Step 7).

inputs.name: Add metadata
inputs.description: Add metadata columns to the Seurat object (Step 8).

inputs.name: Run DGE
inputs.description: Perform differential gene expression contrasts (Step 8).

inputs.name: Automated library prep
inputs.description: Whether or not to perform automated library prep.

inputs.name: FASTQ directory
inputs.description: Directory containing the FASTQ files. This directory should only contain FASTQ files for the experiment.

inputs.name: Sample names
inputs.description: The sample names used to name the FASTQ files according to CellRanger nomeclature

inputs.name: Rename samples
inputs.description: Whether or not you want to rename your samples. These names will be used to identify cells in the Seurat objects

inputs.name: New sample names
inputs.description: New sample names. Make sure they are defined in the same order as the old labels are listed in par_sample_names

inputs.name: Paired-end sequencing
inputs.description: Whether or not paired-end sequencing was performed

inputs.name: Reference genome
inputs.description: Reference genome for FASTQ alignment. 10X Genomics reference genomes are available for download. For more information see the 10X Genomics documentation.

inputs.name: R1 length
inputs.description: Minimum number of bases to retain for R1 sequence of gene expression

inputs.name: R2 length
inputs.description: Minimum number of bases to retain for R2 sequence of gene expression

inputs.name: Include introns
inputs.description: Whether or not to include intronic reads in the gene expression matrix

inputs.name: No target UMI filter
inputs.description: Whether or not to turn off CellRanger

inputs.name: Expected cells
inputs.description: Expected number of cells. By default, CellRanger

inputs.name: Force cells
inputs.description: Force the CellRanger count pipeline to use N cells.

inputs.name: No bam
inputs.description: Whether or not to skip the bam file generation in the CellRanger pipeline.

inputs.name: RNA run names
inputs.description: The names of the sequencing runs for the RNA assay

inputs.name: HTO run names
inputs.description: The names of the sequencing runs for the HTO assay

inputs.name: Seq run names
inputs.description: The user-selected name for the sequencing run. These names will be used to identify cells in the Seurat objects

inputs.name: ID
inputs.description: Barcode ID which will be used to track the feature counts

inputs.name: Name
inputs.description: The user-selected name for the barcode identifier

inputs.name: Read
inputs.description: Which RNA sequencing read contains the barcode sequence. This value Will be either R1 or R2.

inputs.name: Pattern
inputs.description: The pattern of the barcode identifiers

inputs.name: Sequence
inputs.description: The nucleotide sequence associated with the barcode identifier

inputs.name: Save RNA expression matrix
inputs.description: If you want to save an RNA expression matrix

inputs.name: Save metadata dataframe
inputs.description: If you want to save a metadata dataframe

inputs.name: Ambient RNA
inputs.description: If you want to include ambient RNA in the analysis

inputs.name: Min Cells L
inputs.description: Only retain genes that are present in at least a specified number of cells

inputs.name: Normalization method
inputs.description: Normalization method

inputs.name: Scale factor
inputs.description: Scale factor

inputs.name: Selection method
inputs.description: Method for choosing the top variable features

inputs.name: Number of features
inputs.description: Number of features to select as top variable features

inputs.description: If you want to save an RNA expression matrix

inputs.description: If you want to save a metadata dataframe
